course_description: Provide practical skills and knowledge to complete a PhD dissertation in Biostatistics and to introduce students to the research of BIOS faculty. Students will become familiar with the process of PhD research in biostatistical methods.
schedule_location: F 1pm-2:50pm in Grace Crum Rollins P39
